text: "The ultimate state of love is freedom, absolute freedom, and any relationship that destroys freedom is not worthwhile ~ Osho"
"Pleasure is animal, happiness is human, bliss is divine. ~ Osho"
"Happy New Year 2012 to one and all..Lots of Love, Light, Peace and Joy ?"
"Past and future are two aspects of the same coin. The name of the coin is mind.  ~ Osho"
"Courage is not the absence of fear, says Osho. It is, rather, the total presence of fear, with the courage to face it. ~ Osho"
"No dead principles can help, but only living consciousness. Be absolutely unprincipled and just follow life ~ OSHO"
"Wisdom is a very relaxed state of being.Wisdom is nt knowledge,ntinformation wisdom is ur inner being awake,alert,watchful,full of light."
"Life in itself is so beautiful that to ask the question of the meaning of life is simply nonsense. ~ Osho"
"Respect life, revere life. There is nothing more holy than life, nothing more divine than life.~Osho"
"Love brings freedom, and lust simply creates prisons for you. ~ Osho"
"Life is not serious. Only graveyards are serious, death is serious. Life is love, life is laughter, life is dance, song. ~ Osho"
"1/1 Harmony is not something very great, it is boring.  Once in a while, even if you fight, once in a while even if you get really hot...."
"The moment you see that whatsoever you are is your own creation, you are freed from all outer causes and circumstances~Osho"
"Zen is not a philosophy, it is poetry. It does not propose, it simply persuades. It does not argue, it simply sings its own song ~Osho"
"Don’t be angry at life. It is not life that is frustrating you, it is you who are not listening to life ~ Osho"
"Respect life, revere life. There is nothing more holy than life, nothing more divine than life.~Osho"
"If your love is so great that it can contain renunciation, only then is it love.~Osho"
"A woman has perfect qualities to bcum a disciple. Surrender is easy for her.It's natural part of d feminine being; surrender comes easily"
"Be ~ don't try to become ? Osho"
"Go easy on yourself, for the outcome of all affairs is determined by God’s decree ~ Osho"
"Your God cannot be more than you, because your God is your innermost core of being. So if you want to know what God is, become more alive."
"A serious person can never be innocent, and one who is innocent can never be serious. ~ Osho"
"Remember, man is not for law; law is for man. And if law is not helping man, then it has to be changed ~ Osho"
"My approach is neither of attachment nor of detachment, but of simple understanding ~ OSHO"
"1/2 and the moment a child becomes serious you have killed him.... you have disconnected him from his own source...."
"Love is just like a breeze: it comes, but you should not close your doors to keep the breeze inside ~ Osho"
"1/1 Life is basically insecure. That's its intrinsic quality; it cannot be changed. Death is secure, absolutely secure."
"1/2 Then there is no need to repress doubt; it evaporates by itself. Then there is no need for you to believe. -OSHO"
"The ego is a deep desire to dominate. The ego is a deep desire that says, ""I am special, higher, bigger, greater than you."" ~OSHO"
"What was your OSHO moment of the day?"
"Unless your life becomes an ecstasy, you have not lived it. You have missed the very point, the bull's eye. ~ Osho"
"Love is God. God can be forgotten, but don't forget love -- because it is the purification of love that will bring you to God ~ Osho"
"Beliefs are man-made; trust is God-made ~ Osho"
"Your mind is very complex, very tricky. It makes simple things complicated~ Osho"
"One day you will disappear on a funeral pyre - just into nothingness, as smoke. Don't get attached to anything. ~ Osho"
"Love makes you wise, but never knowledgeable. Knowledge makes you cunning and clever, but never loving.  ~ Osho"
"The suffering is only a pointer,dn’t make it ur life style;dn’t become masochist, for masochism is a disease from which many people suffer"
"FAITH is not rationalization at all: neither for nor against, neither this nor that. Faith is a trusting, a love ~ Osho"
"You cannot deceive anyone unless someone is ready to be deceived ~ Osho"
"Please don’t get obsessed with fear. Just jump out of it and take a move towards love. ~ Osho"
"Only love creates trust. ~Osho"
"The only refuge is the perfection of wisdom, the perfection of meditation."
"To create guilt, all that you need is a very simple thing: start calling mistakes, errors -- sins. They are simply mistakes, human ~ Osho"
"Love cannot be taught, it can only be caught ~ Osho"
"The ego is a deep desire to dominate. The ego is a deep desire that says, ""I am special, higher, bigger, greater than you."" ~OSHO"
"You just listen to your own heart-- that is your only teacher. In the real journey of life, your own intuition is your only teacher ~ Osho"
"My message of love is of that love which is capable of absorbing hate and transforming it.. ~Osho"
"Happiness is not the end result of desire. It is an attitude, not a desire. Happiness is an art. It is a way of life ~ Osho"
"Live automatically - moment to moment - and then your life will have a totally different quality; the quality of the divine ~ Osho"
"Suffering is not holding you, you are holding suffering ~Osho"
"Laughter is a tremendously helpful method to shake off all dust that everybody gathers without his knowing ~OSHO"
"Whenever you plan for love, whenever deliberateness enters into it it becomes phony and false. ~Osho"
"You are simply a witness, no judgment, no evaluation, but a pure silent witnessing like a mirror."
"When you are behaving unconsciously there is the gate of hell; when you become alert and conscious, there is the gate of heaven. -OSHO"
"1/1  God has given you this life, this tremendously valuable gift, and you cannot even appreciate it. You cannot welcome it,"
"Depth takes you out of the ego. That’s why people are afraid of love..Love so deeply, so totally that the lover disappears ~ Osho"
"Those who give you goals are your enemies. Those who tell you what to become and how to become it, are the poisoners. ~Osho"
"To possess anything is to be possessed by it. The more you possess, the more slavery you create around yourself ~ Osho"
"Take it easy, and remember ""Easy is Right ~ Osho"
"Live in freedom. Live the life you really want to live. Do not try to be somebody else, just be yourself ~ Osho"
"Nobody has the power to take two steps together; you can take only one step at a time ? Osho"
"Laughter is a tremendously helpful method to shake off all dust that everybody gathers without his knowing ~OSHO"
"Life is a garden. It is an opportunity. You can grow weeds, you can grow roses; it all depends on you.-Osho"
"It matters not who you love, where you love, why you love, when you love, or how you love, it matters only that You LOVE. ~ Osho"
"""Nobody is here to fulfill your dream. Everybody is here to fulfill his own destiny, his own reality."""
"Your whole idea about yourself is borrowed - borrowed from those who have no idea of who they are themselves. ~Osho"
"Only love creates trust. ~Osho"
"The innermost core is witnessing, awareness, watchfulness. You can call it anything, but it will be another meaning of witnessing.~ Osho"
"The world is not a problem; the problem is our unawareness. ~Osho"
"1/2 and the moment a child becomes serious you have killed him.... you have disconnected him from his own source...."
"Consciousness is the bridge, the golden bridge, from this world to the other, from hell to heaven, from the ego to the divine..~Osho"
"Life is a mirror, it reflects your face.Be friendly, and all of life will reflect friendliness. ~ Osho"
"The day you can start finding me wherever you are is the greatest day of your life."
"Laughter is prayer. If you can laugh you have learnt how to pray. Don't be serious; a serious person can never be religious. ~ Osho"
"How can one become enlightened? One can, because one is enlightened - one just has to recognize the fact~Osho"
"Love is not manageable, it is simply something that happens, and the moment you try to manage it everything misfire ~ Osho"
"DEATH is a door to God. Those who knows how to die know how to enter into God. Clingers clinging to life never know what God is.~ Osho"
"Nothing is more honorable than enlightenment, nothing is more beautiful than virtue ~Osho"
"When you live at the optimum, then you know what life is. And then you know the celebration of it and the benediction of it. ~ Osho"
"Anything that gives you freedom is right, and anything that destroys your freedom is wrong.~ Osho"
"We have to change this world by celebrating, by dancing, by singing, by music, by meditation, by love, not by struggle ~ Osho"
"The innermost core is witnessing, awareness, watchfulness. You can call it anything, but it will be another meaning of witnessing.~ Osho"
"Put everything at stake. Be a gambler! Risk everything, because the next moment is not certain, so why bother? Why be concerned? ~Osho"
"Happiness is not conditional; nothing is needed to be happy. Only to be alive is needed — and that you are, you already are. ~Osho"
"Nobody has the power to take two steps together; you can take only one step at a time ? Osho"
"There is no end to man’s self-deception, because whatsoever he is going to do he can rationalize it ~ Osho"
"You are creating your own hell ~ Osho"
"DEATH is a door to God. Those who knows how to die know how to enter into God. Clingers clinging to life never know what God is ~ Osho"
"Trust is tremendously powerful. ~ Osho"
"Love is not sexual passion. Those who mistake sex for love remain empty of love. Sex is only a passing manifestation of love."
"Competition and jealousy is the root cause of all misery. There is no good competition — all competition is bad ~Osho"
"I am not anti-life as other religions are. I am absolutely for life, and life in its essence means love.  ~ Osho"
"Love never hurts anybody. It is something else pretending to be love which feels hurt ~ Osho"
"We all cling to the past, and because we cling to the past we become unavailable to the present. ~ Osho"
"22 Years ago today Osho left his body ~ OSHO the great master of masters. The ultimate master for ever. ?"
"Once I was on a journey and someone asked me which word in a man's vocabulary was the most valuable. My reply was, Love ~ Osho"
"ONE becomes scared of love, then people remain satisfied with bodily love and they believe this to be love in its entirity ~Osho"
"Depth takes you out of the ego. That’s why people are afraid of love..Love so deeply, so totally that the lover disappears ~ Osho"
"When love and trust meet, their ultimate byproduct is surrender. You relax into the master, into his being, without holding anything.~Osho"
"Growth comes out of living, progress comes out of sacrificing. Growth is life, progress is suicide.~Osho"
"Only love creates trust. ~Osho"
"Man has nothing else to do but surrender — in deep trust, in deep love. Don’t be a doer, just surrender. Let there be a let-go. ~Osho"
"Stupidity is repetition, repeating others. It is cheap, cheap because you need not learn. Learning is arduous. It needs guts to learn~Osho"
"Intelligence never grows by imitation:Intelligence grows by experimentation. Intelligence grows by taking challenges.~ Osho"
"A MASTER IS ONE who can create devices for everybody. A master is one who has no fixed device.'Happy Guru Purnima'"
"~?~?~?~?~?~  I am not going to waste my sleep because people are misunderstanding me~ Osho ~?~?~?~?~?~"
"Your marriage is a subtle politics of domination. Your fatherhood, motherhood, is a subtle politics. ~ Osho"
"Prayer is a state of simplicity. It is NOT of words but of silence. ~Osho"
"Respect life, revere life. There is nothing more holy than life, nothing more divine than life.. ~Osho"
"You can become happy just by deciding to be happy ~ Osho"
"DEATH is a door to God. Those who knows how to die know how to enter into God. Clingers clinging to life never know what God is.~ Osho"
"The whole world is a cyclone.But once you have found d center d cyclone disappears.This nothingness is the ultimate peak of consciousness."
"People are not things, you cannot have ownership. ~ Osho"
"There is only one way to be happy, and that is to be happy here, now. Happiness is not a result. It is a way of life. ~ Osho"
"Anything that gives you freedom is right, and anything that destroys your freedom is wrong.~ Osho"
"Doubt is the vestibule which we all must pass through before we can enter the temple of truth!.~Osho"
"Clinging to life creates the fear of death, and the fear of death creates death. Otherwise, there is no death and no fear. ~ Osho"
"If whatsoever you have been living can be conveyed by words, that means you have not lived at all. ~ Osho ?"
"Don’t be angry at life. It is not life that is frustrating you, it is you who are not listening to life. – Osho"
"""There is no need of any competition with anybody. You are yourself, and as you are, you are perfectly good. Accept yourself."""
"Everybody has a judgment, and when people have judgments they lose their innocence. ~ Osho"
"Life is not serious. Only graveyards are serious, death is serious. Life is love, life is laughter, life is dance, song. ~ Osho"
"Nature provides you with every guarantee that if you move naturally you will attain. ~Osho"
"Love can never possess. Love is giving freedom to the other. Love is an unconditional gift, it is not a bargain~Osho"
"Sadness is nothing but an absence of joy. Misery also nothing but absence- absence of blissfulness ~ Osho"
"“Truth  is not something outside to be discovered, it is something inside to be  realized.” - OSHO"
"Freedom is a ladder: one side of the ladder reaches hell, the other side touches heaven. It is the SAME ladder;the choice is yours ~ Osho"
"""The heart knows nothing of the past, nothing of the future; it knows only of the present. The heart has no time concept."""
"Paradise is not something geographical; You cannot find it in space. It is a quality that you can allow to grow in your being ~ Osho"
"Borrowed knowledge is ignorance. Experienced truth makes you not knowledgeable, but humble . ~ Osho"
"Life is not a tension anywhere except in the minds of humanity~ Osho"
"Love unconditionally. Don't ask anything in return. Don't be a beggar. In love be an emperor. Just give it and see what happens ~Osho"
"Love is so silent that it never asserts itself, it simply accepts whatsoever is the case. It keeps quiet.~ Osho"
"A real emperor is one who lives in himself; he has a center of his own, he does not depend on anybody else..~ Osho"
"They can only be happy if they become what they have come to become. ~ Osho"
"If you choose comfort, convenience, you choose death.Be an individual and pay for it. ~ OSHO"
"Just understand the natural way of things, and do not go against nature,because going against nature creates all sorts of problems ~ Osho"
"Man has to be completely released from all kinds of inhibitions and repressions, and love will become a very silent and cool affair"
"The mind should be trained to be a servant of the heart. Logic should serve love. And then life can become a festival of lights.~Osho"
"Much is possible, if you allow. But to allow is arduous, because to allow you will have to surrender. Emptiness means surrender ~ Osho"
"Love and hate are two faces of sex. If it is perverted, it becomes hate. If accepted deeply, it will become love. ~ Osho"
"If you love, love comes in return. If it is not coming, go deeper; somewhere in the name of love you have done something else. ~ Osho"
"Become more and more innocent, less knowledgeable and more childlike. Take life as fun - because that's precisely what it is!.~Osho"
"Love never makes someone suffer, and if it seems that you have been hurt by love, then it is certainly something else that has been hurt"
"Depression means that somehow anger is in you in a negative state: depression is a negative state of anger...!!"
"Love is never fulfilled just closeness; it is fulfilled only when boundries disappear, and merging and melting happens.~Osho"
"Witness that you are not the body.Witness that you are not the mind.Witness that you are only the witness."
"Human stupidity is infinite. Beware it. It will destroy your whole life. it has destroyed millions of people's lives down the ages ~ Osho"
"If something is meant to go elsewhere, it will never come your way, but if it is yours by destiny, from you it cannot flee. ~ Osho"
"The less people know, the more stubbornly they know it. ~ Osho"
"If you are afraid of being rejected, you will become incapable of love. Afraid of death, you become incapable of life. ~ Osho"
"Love makes you empty, empty of jealousy, empty of power trips, empty of anger, empty of competitiveness ~ Osho"
"To love means to drop the ego, to drop yourself. Love means not to BE~Osho"
"Love yourself so that you can love others.~Osho"
"DEATH is a door to God. Those who knows how to die know how to enter into God. Clingers clinging to life never know what God is ~ Osho"
"Jealousy means ego, jealousy means unconsciousness. Jealousy means that you have not known even a moment of joy and bliss ~Osho"
"Love knows how to forgive. Love cannot hurt and cannot be violent ~ Osho"
"Meditation means closing eyes; not looking at reflection, but looking at your own being. ~ Osho"
"Seriousness is worse than death. Laughter is life, is love, is light. Laughter in its purest form is a dance of all your energies ~ Osho"
"Each death is your death, because each death is a reminder that you are not going to be here forever ~ Osho"
"This very moment you can drop all problems because they are your creation.~ Osho"
"Go easy on yourself, for the outcome of all affairs is determined by God’s decree ~ Osho"
"Lose the mind and gain consciousness and you are mature. Die to the past and be born to the present and you are mature.~ Osho"
"The pain is not to make you miserable, the pain is to make you more aware •.¸? ¯`•.¸¸.?`*"
"All your knowledge is dust. Knowing is your purity, knowledge is dust. – Osho"
"If we can destroy those ugly lines on the map which divide humanity — there is no reason for war: one thing. ~ Osho"
"In life nothing is permanent... Only dead things can be permanent. The more living a thing is, the more fleeting. OSHO"
"All that you need is just to be silent and listen to existence. There is no need of any religion, there is no need of any God ~ Osho"
"""When love and hate are both absent everything becomes clear and undisguised."" .~Osho"
"Only that which cannot be taken away by death is real. Everything else is unreal, it is made of the same stuff dreams are made of. - Osho"
"What is a dance? how can you define it? But you can dance and you can know the inner feel of it. God is the ultimate dance~ Osho"
"Life is a river. Don't push it and you will not be miserable ~ Osho ?"
"When your ego is no more, only then will you know who you are. ~ Osho"
"""The mind can be used and can be put aside. It is an instrument, a very beautiful instrument; no need to be so obsessed with it."""
"""There is no need of any competition with anybody. You are yourself, and as you are, you are perfectly good. Accept yourself."""
"Life is not logic, life is not philosophy. Life is a dance, a song, a celebration! It is more like love and less like logic. ~ Osho"
"Thank you all for Following and Retweeting.. Love and Peace for All ??? Osho ???"
"Clinging to life creates the fear of death, and the fear of death creates death. Otherwise, there is no death and no fear. ~ Osho"
"Unless your life becomes an ecstasy, you have not lived it. You have missed the very point, the bull's eye. ~ Osho"
"Meaning is man-created. And because you constantly look for meaning, you start to feel meaninglessness ~Osho"
"A moment of truth is more valuable than a hundred years of life, because a moment of truth makes you part of eternity.~ Osho"
"Love is the first step towards the divine, surrender is the last. And two steps is the whole journey ~ Osho"
"Don’t judge people....Rather, love people.  ~ Osho"
"Intelligence never grows by imitation:Intelligence grows by experimentation. Intelligence grows by taking challenges.~ Osho"
"Fear comes from the mind, love comes from your heart; listen to the heart ~Osho"
"Life is a river. Don't push it and you will not be miserable ~ Osho ?"
"All duality is a mind creation, all duality is created by the clinging and attached mind. When there is no attachment there is no duality."
"Love is God. God can be forgotten, but don't forget love -- because it is the purification of love that will bring you to God ~ Osho"
"To possess anything is to be possessed by it. The more you possess, the more slavery you create around yourself ~ Osho"
"To me, this is the only strength, the only power – that we can transform life, we can transform consciousness ~ OSHO"
"Pain also cleanses, purifies. Pain is a fire, and only through the fire does gold come to its real shininess — the gold becomes pure."
"Meaning is man-created. And because you constantly look for meaning, you start to feel meaninglessness ~Osho"
"Be ~ don't try to become ? Osho"
